website_summaries.verdict: Pick this one if wearing a waterproof watch is important to you. However, if you want more of a wood look, check out others we reviewed.
pros: Stands out for its black steel waterproof case – an uncommon feature in wooden watches
We love the walnut face and black leather strap
cons: Has less wooden components than others we considered
Rare incidences of one of the hands breaking off

customer_reviews.title: Great value- real quality product!
customer_reviews.text: These really are super nice. The wood glasses are the same color wood as shown, and they at spring loaded on the sides so the ear pieces can bend outwards to accommodate all size heads. The watch looks really high end, quality. The leather band is thick and looks expensive. The packing is great and the cool wooden glasses case is just an awesome touch. This was worth it 100% I purchased as a gift, and several of us tried on the glasses, they look good on EVERYONE (male or female).
customer_reviews.author: Lightning Le Bran

customer_reviews.title: Quit reading reviews and buy this already
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch for myself and I love it. I love it so much I decided to purchase 8 more for my wedding party. Keeps time, very comfortable, light but sturdy, and sleek. This company is every helpful. The emails I sent for questions were answered very fast. This company truly has a heart and I would recommend them to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bannon

customer_reviews.title: Watch is 5 stars; glasses 1 star
customer_reviews.text: Written on 06/13/2018 Face on the watch is exactly as pictured, the leather band on the watch is very strong for the price. Stitching looks great too. Fits my big wrist. Glasses don't fit my head. I wear a size 7 5/8 fitted hats if that helps. They stay on but I'm scared they'll break due to over exerting the hinges outward. On top of that they were a bit flimsy out the box. I've bought cheaper glasses that were stronger. It's not all bad though, the wood looks amazing, very smooth, and lightweight. Update: 09/02/18 So the glasses broke about 6 weeks ago. So that’s about 1 month after arrival. Watch is still going strong and receives many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Angel G.

customer_reviews.title: A definite winner, especially for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love distinctive timepieces without going broke purchasing them. As a result, I look for very unique pieces, and this is definitely one. I wore it for the first time today and got all sorts of comments on how much everyone liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! Got it for my husband and he loved it! Until after a few months the wrist band snapped off. *****UPDATE AS OF 6/19/19****** The company is amazing! I sent them an email and they replaces my husbands watch because it was within the warranty date! So friendly and very professional!!! I will continue to buy Viable Harvest products for future gifts! It’s so stylish and 100% worth the money!!! They’ve made a lifetime customer out of me and my family!!!
customer_reviews.author: raptorzombie101

customer_reviews.title: Great watch that gets me compliments a lot
customer_reviews.text: Great watch that gets me compliments a lot. The time is pretty accurate not trending fast or slow and watch is built fine. If it had a backlight it would be really perfect but since it doesnt i rotate it with my weekender
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It looks very well made and I'm looking ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It looks very well made and I'm looking forward to seeing how my boyfriend likes it! The leather straps don't say that they're genuine and they smell and feel like foax leather but I like that even more! Overall it's a good purchase and a solid product. Came really quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Compliments On My New Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch lots of compliments. The wood grain face is exceptional, band is smooth. Seems to be a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Minimalism
customer_reviews.text: If you like handsome, understated watches that aren't the size of dinner plates, this is for you. The walnut face changes with the lighting, and is set off very well by the black stainless steel. Band is surprisingly nice and supple for the very reasonable price. Hope Viable Harvest produces new models with cases this size and smaller. As I've only had it a day, can't speak to durability. But I assume the Japanese movement will be reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Oakeshottian

customer_reviews.title: Feels pretty light and not sure how well-made it is
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, unique-looking watch. Feels pretty light and not sure how well-made it is, but it's still ticking and the BF seems to like it enough

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful piece. I ordered it for my husbands birthday. He loved it. The quality of the craftsmanship is excelent.

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Watch
customer_reviews.text: The quality and craftsmanship are worthy of 5 stars. This is a very handsome watch. The leather and wood give it a classic ruggedness. I’m happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: ... gift for my brother but I think he will love it. When it arrived I of course peeked ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my brother but I think he will love it. When it arrived I of course peeked at it and it is a very nice and great quality watch! I’m excited to send this on to my brother for Christmas:).

customer_reviews.title: No need to show off name brands, when quality speaks for itself!

I've still worn the glasses and they get a lot of attention. I'd like to recommend them, but can't considering the poor quality control. I tried to find a customer service line to contact, but could not. Overall, disappointing buy.

In his thank you note he confided that he loves the watch more every time he looks at it...which is often. If that's not enough, even his college friends have told him how great it looks.

A great mix of wood, metal and leather; he wears it all the time (from working in an office, to hiking and traveling). He gets compliments constantly! I even purchased another for a gift for his brother since he liked it so much. Perfect everyday watch and amazing customer service, thank you!

Also, maybe it's just mine, but it doesn't keep time very well. It's slow, Over a couple days it's ends up slow by a couple hours. Seems like some a watch should do.

product_meta.title: Viable Harvest Men’s Wood Watch Walnut Waterproof Black Steel Case Quartz Movement Genuine Leather Strap
product_meta.description:
Are you ready for a watch that's just as unique as you? Our designers at Viable Harvest have created a new hybrid watch with a wood face and black stainless steel case. Our customers get the best of both worlds - the beauty of a wood watch and the durability of stainless steel. Not only does it look and feel great, but it's also 3ATM waterproof compliant! Whether you're indoors washing your hands or outdoors in a wet environment, the Viable Harvest watch is built to last!

Our watch face is crafted with natural, eco-friendly walnut. At just under 2 inches, the faceplate is easy to see, clear and incredibly durable. With a striking black inlay and a second hand, you'll never struggle to see the time. The Japanese quartz movement will keep precise time day after day. Not only is it extremely accurate, it's super quiet and low maintenance. The battery lasts up to four years and is easily replaced. The strap is 100% genuine leather and is long enough to fit almost any wrist. It's soft (no chaffing here!), easily adjustable and reinforced with heavy-duty stitching.

The Viable Harvest watch is perfect as a gift and looks great on men AND women. Many of our customers have told us how unique this watch is - what a great conversation starter! Going casual? No problem! Dressing it up for the office? We've got the look for you! We've also included a custom designed gift box with a soft, black pillow for storage.

At Viable Harvest, we care about our customers. If you're not satisfied with our watch, let us know. We'll do everything we can to make it right. We've got a 100% money back guarantee to boot. So go ahead and order. We've got you covered.

Are you ready for a watch that's just as unique as you? Our designers at Viable Harvest have created a new hybrid watch with a wood face and black stainless steel case. Our customers get the best of both worlds - the beauty of a wood watch and the durability of stainless steel. Not only does it look and feel great, but it's also 3ATM waterproof compliant! Whether you're indoors washing your hands or outdoors in a wet environment, the Viable Harvest watch is built to last!

Our watch face is crafted with natural, eco-friendly walnut. At just under 2 inches, the faceplate is easy to see, clear and incredibly durable. With a striking black inlay and a second hand, you'll never struggle to see the time. The Japanese quartz movement will keep precise time day after day. Not only is it extremely accurate, it's super quiet and low maintenance. The battery lasts up to four years and is easily replaced. The strap is 100% genuine leather and is long enough to fit almost any wrist. It's soft (no chaffing here!), easily adjustable and reinforced with heavy-duty stitching.

The Viable Harvest watch is perfect as a gift and looks great on men AND women. Many of our customers have told us how unique this watch is - what a great conversation starter! Going casual? No problem! Dressing it up for the office? We've got the look for you! We've also included a custom designed gift box with a soft, black pillow for storage.

At Viable Harvest, we care about our customers. If you're not satisfied with our watch, let us know. We'll do everything we can to make it right. We've got a 100% money back guarantee to boot. So go ahead and order. We've got you covered.
feature_bullets: Looking for a wood watch but with a twist? We've got the latest design in watches! Our hybrid walnut wood and black stainless steel looks amazing AND feels great!

Super lightweight waterproof watch with 3ATM water resistant material that's perfect for indoor and outdoor use. Includes a black strap made from 100% authentic leather - soft, comfortable and adjusts to fit most any wrist.

Japanese quartz movement for constant and accurate timing. Not only is this one of the most precise watches you'll ever own, it's ultra quiet and super low maintenance. The battery lasts up to four years and is easily replaced.

Perfect gift for yourself or for that special someone. It's casual enough for every day wear, but looks great with business attire. Want to stand out at the office? This watch is for you. Another bonus? We've included a great looking gift box.
100% money back guarantee - we care about our customers. Not satisfied with our watch? Let us know. We'll do our best to make it right.
